title: What would it cost to build a small island city with a population of 2000-3000 on a 20-30 square kilometer island, if it had to include buildings (mostly lowrises), a two plane airport and a small harbour? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is this island off the coast of Europe or Scotland or 1,000 miles southwest of Tahiti? Are there dock facilities? Are there natural sources for building rock, gravel and sand? On any island exposed to marine storms, hurricanes or typhoons and probably earthquakes in the Pacific — the logical building technique would be Monolithic Domes, which are proven to be totally safe from hurricanes/typhoons/wildfire/earthquakes/lightning/hail, including wind speeds in excess of 200 miles per hour, plus reducing all HVAC costs by 80%, virtually eliminating exterior maintenance costs.As for cost, that harbor could cost $1-Million or $10-Million, Costs for the airport could vary from $20,000 with perfectly flat smooth ground to start with to another $10-Million.Then initial investment for combined solar field and wind powered electrical generation and satellite communications services — Telephone/Internet/TV and radio, plus full emergency communications with both 100 foot tower and ground level antenna array.After that — road, water, sewer, solid waste collection/recycling, communications, administration and education infrastructure —-PLUS medical facilities, at least six staff members and ten in-patient rooms, an O.R., Intensive Care and Emergency Room services. All utilities constructed underground within clear easements.Don’t forget recreation — tennis, golf, archery, bocce ball, shuffleboard; Hiking trails, picnic areas; Football, lacrosse, field hockey; Community fishing boats, multiple sail boats/water ski/pontoon boats for residents and visitors — hopefully many with MONEY. [A single “go fast” Police boat.]A Monolithic Dome central structure could provide visitor cabana suites, deluxe apartments with retractable balconies, one and two bedroom apartments and evern studio apartments — along with the administrative offices, community center with multi use for basketball/volleyball and a community auditorium,/dance floor.Are there perfect natural locations for harbor, airport, water/sewage plants?How much earthwork and site preparation will be required for each structure, the harbor, airport and all other facilities? How much base preparation will be needed for each section of streets and roads?

You are asking question for proffesional estimator. The answer, even in ranges requires tentative design and evaluation of the prices and conditions in specific locality.
